channel.title: Game crash at Blast Pit
channel.description: Hello friends, great game thus far! When I have finished speaking with the scientist and start moving forward at the beginning of the Blast Pit the game crashes and gives me the following [url='https://imgur.com/pHUEe']error[/url]. Attached is the mini dump. Cheers, Jessiah hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T19_31_24C0.mdmp (110 KB)

item.title: Game crash at Blast Pit
item.dc:creator: Jessiah
item.description:
I just re-loaded and worked fine. No idea what the problem was. Thanks for your reply and help though!

Doltman945:

People have said you have to destroy the crates, but the problem seemed to me that the game dosen’t like loading that particle effect at high resolutions. Dropping down to 1024x768 for that part (prety much untill you get annother load screen) worked for me, though it still crashed once on the lower resolution.

Read full topic

item.title: Game crash at Blast Pit
item.dc:creator: Jessiah
item.description:
Hello friends,

great game thus far!

When I have finished speaking with the scientist and start moving forward at the beginning of the Blast Pit the game crashes and gives me the following error.

Attached is the mini dump.

Cheers,

Jessiah
